member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase
member.summary: A base class for Blazor components.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.Attributes
member.summary: A collection of attributes that will be merged onto the component when rendered.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.AttributeBuilder
member.summary: An attribute builder that is used when building attributes for the element before rendering.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.ChildContent
member.summary: Enables child content for the control.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.ClassBuilder
member.summary: A class builder that is used when building the class names for the element before rendering.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.Classes
member.summary: Returns a read-only copy of the classes defined on the component.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.Styles
member.summary: Returns a read-only copy of the inline styles defined on the component.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.StyleBuilder
member.summary: A style builder that is used when building styles for the element before rendering.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.SetParametersAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.ParameterView)
member.summary: Prepares the component for parameters.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.AddAttribute(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an attribute to the dictionary.
member.param: The name of the attribute to add.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.AddClasses(System.String[])
member.summary: Adds the given classes to the collection.
member.param: An array of class names to add.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.AddStyle(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a style to the style dictionary. The style dictionary will be rendered as an inline style attribute on the resulting element.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.OnParametersSet
member.summary: Handles builders set on the component.
member.remarks: If you override this method, you must call the base implementation at some point in your implementation.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.RemoveAttribute(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the attribute with the given name.
member.param: The name of the attribute to remove.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.RemoveClass(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the given class from the collection.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.BlazoradeComponentBase.RemoveStyle(System.String)
member.summary: Removes the given style from the styles dictionary.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.AttributeBuilder
member.summary: A generic attribute builder implementation that implements the interface.

member.summary: Creates an instance of the builder.

member.summary: Creates an instance of the builder and specifies the attributes to load into the instance.
member.param: The attributes to load into the builder.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.AttributeBuilder.Add(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Adds an attribute to the builder.
member.remarks: If an attribute with the given name exists, it will be overwritten.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.BuilderBase`1
member.summary: A base implementation for builders.
member.typeparam: The type of items handled by the builder.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.BuilderBase`1.Items
member.summary: Returns the items contained in the builder.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.BuilderBase`1.Build
member.summary: Builds the items and returns them as a collection.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.BuilderBase`1.Add(`0)
member.summary: Adds an item to the builder.

member.summary: Adds a range of items to the builder.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.ClassBuilder
member.summary: A generic class builder that implements the interface.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.ClassBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of the builder.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.ClassBuilder.#ctor(System.String[])
member.summary: Creates an instance of the builder and loads it with the given classes.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.ClassBuilder.Add(System.String[])
member.summary: Adds the given classes to the builder.
member.param: The classes to add to the builder.
member.remarks: Only the given classes that do not already exist in the builder are added.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.IAttributeBuilder
member.summary: The interface implemented by attribute builders.
member.remarks: An attribute builder is an implementation that builds attributes for an element to add when it is rendered.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.IBuilder`1
member.summary: The base interface for all builders.
member.typeparam: The type of item the builder can handle.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.IBuilder`1.Build
member.summary: Builds the items and returns them as a collection.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.IClassBuilder
member.summary: The interface that defines a class builder.
member.remarks: A class builder is an implementation that builds class names for an element to add when it is rendered.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.IStyleBuilder
member.summary: The interface implemented by style builders.
member.remarks: A style builder is an implementation that builds styles for an element to add to it when rendering.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.StyleBuilder
member.summary: A generic style builder implementation that can also be used as base for other builder implementations.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.StyleBuilder.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of the builder.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.StyleBuilder.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}[])
member.summary: Creates an instance of the class and loads it with styles.
member.param: The styles to load into the instance.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Core.Components.Builder.StyleBuilder.Add(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a style to the builder.
member.param: The name of the style to add.
member.remarks: If a style with the given name already exists, it will be overwritten.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.Redirect.Delay
member.summary: A delay in milliseconds before redirecting to the specified URL.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Core.Components.Redirect.Url
